title: View BDD test results in TestOps
description: Behavior-driven development (BDD) is enabled in Katalon Studio. From Katalon Studio version 7.8.0, you can integrate BDD-enabled projects with Katalon TestOps. By doing so, you can see native BDD Test Results with their Features and Scenarios.

frontMatter.title: View BDD test results in TestOps
